page.title: 15UNIFORM ORGANISATIONS
page.content: Scouts is on every Friday night and we go to church every first Sunday in the month or very special occasions like Christmas. Every year we have a "Drink-station" for the runners in the Half Marathon. There are 8 camps a year. About 20 of us camp at Hesley or Squirrel Wood. The uniform is a green shirt, brown trousers, green beret and a purple and white necker.At scouts we play games and learn how to do things like tying ropes and skills for badges, first aid etc. Sometimes we go to the woods or on to the field,and learn to make bivouacs and so on. Cubs and Scouts are boys, Brownies and Guides are girls. Venture Scouts are boys and girls. Cubs are 8 to 10 Scouts are 10 to 16 Venture Scouts 16 to 21 years. Brownies 7 to 10, Guides 10-14 years. There are no other Uniform groups in Wadworth.
